alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Itawamba and south central Tishomingo Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairview, or 8 miles northeast of Fulton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belmont, Tremont, Fairview, Sandy Springs, Clay, Golden, Eastman and Bounds Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
